list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add Pydantic schemas for `Gym` module
- Introduced schemas for `Exercise`, including `ExerciseBase`, `ExerciseCreate`, `ExerciseUpdate`, and `ExerciseResponse` in `schemas.py` for validation and serialization. - Updated `Exercise` model to refine relationships and remove unused comments.

task.summary: Default task
Initial FastAPI project setup with `.gitignore`, dependencies, and basic configuration

Add configuration management and database setup
- Introduced `pydantic-settings` for environment-based configuration in `config.py`. - Added placeholders for database configuration in `db.py`. - Updated dependencies in `pyproject.toml` to include `pydantic-settings`.

Add Docker support with Dockerfile and docker-compose
- Created a `Dockerfile` for containerizing the application. - Added `docker-compose.yml` for orchestrating services (FastAPI app, PostgreSQL, Redis).

Update dependencies and implement asynchronous database setup
- Added `asyncio` to dependencies for supporting asynchronous operations. - Implemented asynchronous database setup using `SQLAlchemy` with `AsyncSession` and `async_sessionmaker`.
Refactor database configuration to use dynamic `DATABASE_URL` generation from environment variables
Add `Exercise` model and `MuscleGroup` enum for exercise management

Add `User` model with fields for user management
- Introduced a `User` model under `app/modules/user/models.py`.

Add `Workout` model and `WorkoutStatus` enum for workout management
- Introduced a `Workout` model under `app/modules/workout/models.py`. - Created `WorkoutStatus` enum in `app/modules/workout/enums.py`.

Add `WorkoutExercise` and `WorkoutSet` models for detailed workout tracking
- Introduced `WorkoutExercise` model in `app/modules/workout_exercises/models.py` to associate exercises with workouts. - Added `WorkoutSet` model in `app/modules/workout_sets/models.py` to track sets, reps, and weights for exercises. - Updated `Workout` model imports to optimize and remove unused dependencies.

Refactor module structure: consolidate workout-related models under `training` and exercise-related models under `gym`
- Moved `Workout`, `WorkoutExercise`, and `WorkoutSet` models to `app/modules/training/models.py`. - Relocated `Exercise` model to `app/modules/gym/models.py`. - Updated imports and restructured enums accordingly. - Removed deprecated files and optimized relationships.

Update dependencies and Docker configuration
- Added `asyncpg` and `psycopg2` to `pyproject.toml` for PostgreSQL support. - Adjusted `CMD` in `Dockerfile` for better compatibility with the virtual environment.

Update `.env` and Docker configuration
- Introduced `.env` file for managing environment variables. - Updated `docker-compose.yml` to use `.env` for database configuration and added a volume for the Python virtual environment. - Replaced `psycopg2` with `psycopg2-binary` for simplified dependency management.

Update dependencies and improve database integration
- Upgraded `FastAPI` and `Alembic` dependencies to their latest versions. - Updated `created_at` field in the `User` model to use `server_default` with `func.now()` for accurate timestamp management. - Enhanced `.venv` setup in IDE configuration for improved project consistency.

Add Alembic integration and initial database migration
- Configured Alembic for managing database migrations, including `alembic.ini` and `env.py` setup. - Added an initial migration with `User`, `Exercise`, `Workout`, `WorkoutExercise`, and `WorkoutSet` tables.
Add `__init__.py` files for `gym`, `training`, and `user` modules to organize package structure

Add IDE data source configuration and base schema model
- Configured `.idea/dataSources.xml` for PostgreSQL `workout_db` connection in local development. - Introduced `CustomModel` in `schemas.py` with `ConfigDict` for `pydantic` configuration.

Add Pydantic schemas for `User` module
- Introduced `UserBase`, `UserCreate`, `UserUpdate`, and `UserResponse` schemas in `schemas.py` for user data validation and serialization.

Add Pydantic schemas for `Training` module
- Introduced schemas for `Workout`, `WorkoutExercise`, and `WorkoutSet` in `schemas.py` for validation and serialization. - Updated dependencies (`email-validator`, `ruff`) in `pyproject.toml` and IDE configurations.

Add Pydantic schemas for `Gym` module
- Introduced schemas for `Exercise`, including `ExerciseBase`, `ExerciseCreate`, `ExerciseUpdate`, and `ExerciseResponse` in `schemas.py` for validation and serialization. - Updated `Exercise` model to refine relationships and remove unused comments.

MESSAGE.value: Initial FastAPI project setup with `.gitignore`, dependencies, and basic configuration

Add configuration management and database setup
- Introduced `pydantic-settings` for environment-based configuration in `config.py`. - Added placeholders for database configuration in `db.py`. - Updated dependencies in `pyproject.toml` to include `pydantic-settings`.

Add Docker support with Dockerfile and docker-compose
- Created a `Dockerfile` for containerizing the application. - Added `docker-compose.yml` for orchestrating services (FastAPI app, PostgreSQL, Redis).

Update dependencies and implement asynchronous database setup
- Added `asyncio` to dependencies for supporting asynchronous operations. - Implemented asynchronous database setup using `SQLAlchemy` with `AsyncSession` and `async_sessionmaker`.
Refactor database configuration to use dynamic `DATABASE_URL` generation from environment variables
Add `Exercise` model and `MuscleGroup` enum for exercise management

Add `User` model with fields for user management
- Introduced a `User` model under `app/modules/user/models.py`.

Add `Workout` model and `WorkoutStatus` enum for workout management
- Introduced a `Workout` model under `app/modules/workout/models.py`. - Created `WorkoutStatus` enum in `app/modules/workout/enums.py`.

Add `WorkoutExercise` and `WorkoutSet` models for detailed workout tracking
- Introduced `WorkoutExercise` model in `app/modules/workout_exercises/models.py` to associate exercises with workouts. - Added `WorkoutSet` model in `app/modules/workout_sets/models.py` to track sets, reps, and weights for exercises. - Updated `Workout` model imports to optimize and remove unused dependencies.

Refactor module structure: consolidate workout-related models under `training` and exercise-related models under `gym`
- Moved `Workout`, `WorkoutExercise`, and `WorkoutSet` models to `app/modules/training/models.py`. - Relocated `Exercise` model to `app/modules/gym/models.py`. - Updated imports and restructured enums accordingly. - Removed deprecated files and optimized relationships.

Update dependencies and Docker configuration
- Added `asyncpg` and `psycopg2` to `pyproject.toml` for PostgreSQL support. - Adjusted `CMD` in `Dockerfile` for better compatibility with the virtual environment.

Update `.env` and Docker configuration
- Introduced `.env` file for managing environment variables. - Updated `docker-compose.yml` to use `.env` for database configuration and added a volume for the Python virtual environment. - Replaced `psycopg2` with `psycopg2-binary` for simplified dependency management.

Update dependencies and improve database integration
- Upgraded `FastAPI` and `Alembic` dependencies to their latest versions. - Updated `created_at` field in the `User` model to use `server_default` with `func.now()` for accurate timestamp management. - Enhanced `.venv` setup in IDE configuration for improved project consistency.

Add Alembic integration and initial database migration
- Configured Alembic for managing database migrations, including `alembic.ini` and `env.py` setup. - Added an initial migration with `User`, `Exercise`, `Workout`, `WorkoutExercise`, and `WorkoutSet` tables.
Add `__init__.py` files for `gym`, `training`, and `user` modules to organize package structure

Add IDE data source configuration and base schema model
- Configured `.idea/dataSources.xml` for PostgreSQL `workout_db` connection in local development. - Introduced `CustomModel` in `schemas.py` with `ConfigDict` for `pydantic` configuration.

Add Pydantic schemas for `User` module
- Introduced `UserBase`, `UserCreate`, `UserUpdate`, and `UserResponse` schemas in `schemas.py` for user data validation and serialization.

Add Pydantic schemas for `Training` module
- Introduced schemas for `Workout`, `WorkoutExercise`, and `WorkoutSet` in `schemas.py` for validation and serialization. - Updated dependencies (`email-validator`, `ruff`) in `pyproject.toml` and IDE configurations.

Add Pydantic schemas for `Gym` module
- Introduced schemas for `Exercise`, including `ExerciseBase`, `ExerciseCreate`, `ExerciseUpdate`, and `ExerciseResponse` in `schemas.py` for validation and serialization. - Updated `Exercise` model to refine relationships and remove unused comments.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Add Pydantic schemas for `Gym` module
- Introduced schemas for `Exercise`, including `ExerciseBase`, `ExerciseCreate`, `ExerciseUpdate`, and `ExerciseResponse` in `schemas.py` for validation and serialization. - Updated `Exercise` model to refine relationships and remove unused comments.
